title: Emerald Bloom Nakshi Haaram - A Touch of Timeless Elegance
features: This exquisite Haaram features a classic design with a modern twist. The neckpiece is crafted with intricate Nakshi work detailing floral motifs, complemented by vibrant green emeralds set in a secure bezel setting. The central pendant boasts a square, filigree design outlined with sparkling diamonds and emeralds, finished with delicate gold bead dangles. The design blends traditional South Indian artistry with contemporary aesthetics.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Its contemporary design also makes it suitable for formal gatherings.
description: This Nakshi Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's a heirloom. The intricate craftsmanship, high-quality gemstones, and timeless design make it a valuable investment. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance, while the blend of traditional and modern elements makes it versatile for various occasions. Experience the grandeur of South Indian heritage with a contemporary touch. A perfect gift for the discerning woman.
